atsone: Sci Hibiscus is a recognised player in property development and management, with over 24 years of experience and a strong presence in Yaoundé, Douala and other cities. Our sustainable and structuring projects enable us to grow in a controlled and continuous manner. Sci Hibiscus offers career opportunities in all areas of real estate: project development, transactions, property management, monitoring and project management, as well as technical and administrative functions.
atstwo: Beyond demanding assignments and professional challenges, what sets Sci Hibiscus apart is its team spirit, rigour and collective determination to deliver high-quality, useful and sustainable projects. At Sci Hibiscus, integrity, commitment and mindset are just as important as skills and performance.
